inputs.name: heght
inputs.description: height of the editor. Supports all units as that of css height property

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Method which will be called whenever a key is down. It will add a tab space on clikc of tab key

methods.name: updateContent
methods.description: content of the editor will be binded to the value

methods.name: safeHTML
methods.description: Bypasses the sanitization done by angular and returns the value
